title: duck_coop_midday_temperature_humidity_reading
summary: Midday temperature and humidity reading inside an empty duck coop.
description: Environmental measurement inside the duck coop taken at midday. The reading shows a significant increase in temperature and a decrease in relative humidity compared to the morning measurement. This record serves as evidence of diurnal environmental variation within the same structure.

comparison_reference.note: Used for temporal comparison only; no causal interpretation applied.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
